Package se.idsec.signservice.security.sign

Interfaces and classes for signing.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SignatureValidationResult
    Interface representing the (successful) result of a signature validation operation.
    SignatureValidator<T>
    Generic interface representing a signature validator instance that supports validating documents having one more signatures.
    Signer<T,​R extends SignerResult<T>,​P extends SignerParameters>
    Interface that represents a signer, i.e.
    SignerParameters
    Marker interface for signer parameters for the Signer interface.
    SignerResult<T>
    Representation of the result to an Signer.sign(Object) invocation.
    SigningCredential Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    use PkiCredential instead.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    VoidSignerParameters
    Instance of a void SignerParameters instance.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AdesProfileType
    An enumeration representing the different ETSI AdES types.
    SignatureValidationResult.Status
    Representation of the validation status of a signature.
